name: EyeRace
description:
EYERACE- eyerace is an Eye exercise game, where you can improve your decision making power in very short of time. Now is your time to improve yourself.

Being an EYERACER Save the bouncing Ball falling down from incomplete Ring cycle, Ring Cycle is rotating with the speed whatever you can set according to your ability. Ring can rotate clockwise and anticlockwise with two button at bottom left and bottom right respectively.

 In the EyeRace Bouncing Ball's speed with continuous collision it will increase, you can control the speed of Bouncing Ball with help of collision

 and Rotation of Ring simultaneously.

Note: this game may contain In-app purchases and may also contain third-party ads that may redirect you to a third-party site.

thanks for your support and keep playing our games!
